title: Pablo Neruda 名句 求解

replies.msg:
有冇人可以幫我解釋以下呢句詩

“And one by one the nights between our separated cities are joined to the night that unites us.”

(Ode and Burgeonings
~Pablo Neruda)

quote.msg:
有冇人可以幫我解釋以下呢句詩

“And one by one the nights between our separated cities are joined to the night that unites us.”

(Ode and Burgeonings
~Pablo Neruda)

replies.msg:
好似新詩咁, 只可意會, 難以解釋
相隔異地的一夜夜 / 融入了我們相聚的那一晚

想同你搵中譯本, 可惜免費的幾個大陸譯本都無錄入
得台灣有要俾錢買的 船長之詩 (頌歌和萌芽第3節)
